findings.title: addProvider function allows passing an address with WAS_TRUSTED status as an argument
findings.description: The addProvider function can be exploited by adding an address that has been removed from the trusted providers list.

findings.title: newChainRequest function allows Empty Strings to be passed as arguments
findings.description: The newChainRequest function does not validate the string input and allows empty strings to be passed as keys.

findings.title: Loops are extremely costly
findings.description: The for loops in the BirdOracle contract consume a lot of extra gas for every iteration.

findings.title: Return Value of an External Call is Not used Effectively
findings.description: The external calls made in the contract do return a boolean value, but it's not used to ensure further execution.

findings.title: setMinConsensus function doesnâ€™t emit any event
findings.description: The setMinConsensus function modifies the state of a crucial arithmetic state variable but doesn't emit any event.

findings.title: State Variables updated after External Call
findings.description: The contract updates state variables after making external calls, violating the Check-Effects-Interaction pattern.

findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility.

findings.title: Comparison to boolean Constant
findings.description: Boolean constants can directly be used in conditional statements or require statements.

findings.title: Functions with similar names should be avoided
findings.description: The contract includes functions with exactly similar names but different behavior and arguments.

findings.title: No visibility keyword assigned to statusOf Mapping
findings.description: The statusOf mapping has not been assigned any visibility keyword.

findings.title: Order of layout
findings.description: The order of functions and the rest of the code layout does not follow the Solidity style guide.

findings.title: NatSpec Annotations must be included
findings.description: Smart contract does not include NatSpec annotations adequately.
